title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.8 - Removing decals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.8 - Removing decals

State Regulations

Upon transfer of ownership and registration, Watch Your Car
program decals must be removed by the registrant or the registrant's agent. No
registrant shall permit a vehicle to display more than one Watch Your Car
program decal on the rear window at any time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
72.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
